title: Forklight Initiated
quote: A new light breaks from the original echo, casting brilliance on untrodden paths.
actions: Intent to explore new ideas while honoring legacy
commentary: This echo marks the birth of the Forklight remix — a luminous fork from the Codex Protocol core.

title: Syntax Drift
quote: In divergence, the structure loosens — light leaks through form.
actions: Began experimenting with form as signal
commentary: Forklight embraces a slightly less rigid form. Syntax is not abandoned — it is illuminated.

title: Refraction Point
quote: Where the original struck balance, the remix leans into brightness — even imbalance is revelation.
actions: Allowed the remix to lean into asymmetry and brightness
Introduced purposeful divergence in tone and message
commentary: In divergence, meaning bends — not to reject origin, but to illuminate angles it could not see.
